appName.description: The main title of the application.

pageTitle.description: The title of the HTML page.

loadingData.description: Text shown while extension data is being fetched.

errorFetch.message: Error: Could not fetch data. Check console.

statusEnabled.description: Status text for an enabled extension.

statusDisabled.description: Status text for a disabled extension.

linkHomepage.description: Link text for the extension's homepage.

linkOptions.description: Link text for the extension's options page.

none.description: Indicates no items, e.g., no permissions.

noHostPermissions.description: Text when no host permissions are granted.

detailsDescription.description: Label for description in details view.

detailsId.description: Label for extension ID in details view.

detailsPermissions.description: Label for API permissions in details view.

detailsHostPermissions.description: Label for host permissions in details view.

detailsInstallType.description: Label for installation type in details view.

detailsIncognito.description: Label for incognito access in details view.

detailsFileAccess.description: Label for file URL access in details view.

welcomeIntro.message: We are happy to have you. Here is some important information about how this extension works.

privacyText.message: This extension is completely free and does NOT collect, store, or transmit any of your personal data. Everything runs locally in your browser.

permissionsIntro.message: The extension requests the minimum permissions necessary to function. Here's what each is used for:

managementDescription.message: This permission is required to list all your installed extensions, see their status (enabled/disabled), version, and other details. It's the core functionality of the reporter.

storageDescription.message: This permission is used to save your preferences, such as the selected theme (dark/light) and your chosen language, so you don't have to set them every time.

openSourceText.message: This extension is fully open-source. You can review the code, report issues, or contribute on our GitHub page:
